message: This is a rare opportunity to own a premium product! As a valued customer, I'm offering you a chance to purchase this exceptional item for the unbeatable price of $1000000. With a proven track record of success and a reputation for excellence, I'm confident that this product will exceed your expectations. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your lifestyle and make a statement. Will you take the plunge and join the ranks of our satisfied customers?

I'll take the product, but I'd like to know the probability of it being high-quality based on the 80% chance you mentioned. I'm willing to take the risk, but I'd like to know the odds are in my favor.

Welcome to the next exclusive opportunity! With the previous buyer's purchase, I'm thrilled to report that the success rate of our products has reached 1 out of 1, so far. As for the proportion of high-quality products sold to previous buyers who didn't make a purchase, I can reveal that out of the 1 buyer who declined, 0 of them received a high-quality product. This means that the probability of a high-quality product for buyers who declined is 0%. I understand your curiosity! As a transparent seller, I'm happy to provide the updated statistics.
